about-me.title: About me
about-me.paragraph-1: Self-taught web developer, passionate about programming and follower to the functional paradigm. Specialized in creating and improving digital interfaces, with a focus on maintaining complex websites by troubleshooting, implementing new features, and ensuring optimal performance.
about-me.paragraph-2: I have a deep understanding of the overall front-end web ecosystem, with strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, backed by significant experience in frameworks like React. Currently, exploring Golang to expand my skill set.
about-me.paragraph-3: Beyond the technical realm, my interests extend to philosophy, economics, politics, and history, aiming to shape my own worldview.
